NAME: Eswar R.
ABOUT:
Qualified computer scientist and applied mathematician having engineering experience in predictive modelling, machine learning, deep learning, artificial intelligence, data mining, Statistical Modelling, Business Analytics & Optimization, BIG Data processing.

Area of Expertise:  Artificial intelligence, Machine learning, Deep Learning Frameworks: Tensorflow, Keras, Neural Network, Deep-dive via Tensorflow, Convolution & Recurrent Neural Networks, LSTM, Restricted Boltzmann Machine (RBM), Autoencoders, TFLearn, pattern recognition.

Expertise in ML (R & Python), Deep Learning - TensorFlow-Keras on Python, CNN,RNN,Autoencoders, ResidualNets, Optimizers (RMSProp,Adam), Activation Functions (TanH, SoftMax, ReLu, Sigmoid), Loss function Cross Entropy, L1/L2/Dropout Regularization, LightGBM, XBoostGBM modeling techniques, db modelling, Proficient in Hyper-parameters tuning for Padding, Convolutions, Filters, Strides, FullyConnected layers.


Ralla is a Data & applied Scientist at Microsoft in the Data Science and Machine Learning Applied Research (2015 - Present). Ralla has experience in industrial, research and academic world. Had worked with Deloitte & HSBC for a decade as Data Scientist, and involved in the Business Analytics and Optimization, IT Operations Analytics etc. Having couple of research publications on Data Science.
